What happens when you complete a scenario?

Well, there are currently no cards to cover this eventuality and 'close the story' if you will.  To that end I designed cards that fill in the gaps between adventures.  I've only completed the prologues and epilogues for my own scenarios, but I might try tackling the official ones soon too.

You can't copy and paste into these forums so I'll leave the link to the original post for those who are interested:

javascript:void(0);/*1306848310823*/ [http://ratdorg.blogspot.com/2011/05/lord-of-rings-card-game-prologues-and.html]

Enjoy!
